pages.text: Special thanks to the $(#ea7f17)$(l)MCreator Team$() and its community for the great software and support!$(br2)I'm glad you liked my mod and gave it MOTW status.$(br2)Also a special thanks to $(#ea7f17)$(l)NerdyPuzzle$() for creating awesome plugins that allow me to make this mod so much better!

pages.text: Click on the text to follow the link!$(br2)$(l:https://mcreator.net/)MCreator Website$(/l)$(br2)$(l:https://mcreator.net/modification/92563/distant-worlds)Also check out the mod page on the MCreator website!$(/l)
